column2: Judge rules out immediate medical check in suit on Redstone's mental competence LOS ANGELES A California court on Monday rejected a request from the former girlfriend of Sumner Redstone for the 92-year-old chairman of  Viacom Inc to undergo an immediate medical evaluation.
